This is the entry point for the Local Math Hub utility.

   :prog: lmhstatus

"""

import lmhutil
import re
import os
import lmhutil

import argparse


[docs]def create_parser():
  parser = argparse.ArgumentParser(description='Local MathHub Status tool.')
  add_parser_args(parser)
  return parser



[docs]def add_parser_args(parser):
  parser.add_argument('repository', default=["*/*"], nargs='*', help="a list of repositories for which to show the status. ")
  parser.epilog = """
Repository names allow using the wildcard '*' to match any repository. 
  Example:  
    */*       - would match all repositories from all groups. 
    mygroup/* - would match all repositories from group mygrou
""";




[docs]def add_parser(subparsers):
  parser_status = subparsers.add_parser('status', formatter_class=argparse.RawTextHelpFormatter, help='shows the working tree status of repositories')
  add_parser_args(parser_status)




[docs]def do_status(rep):
  cmd = [lmhutil.which("git"), "status", "-u", "-s"];
  result = subprocess.Popen(cmd, 
                                stdout=subprocess.PIPE,
                                cwd=rep
                               ).communicate()[0]
  if len(result) == 0:
    return

  print rep
  print result



[docs]def do(rest):
  if len(rest) == 0:
    rest.append("*/*");

  for repo in rest:
    path = lmhutil.parseRepo(repo);
    for rep in glob.glob(path):
      do_status(rep);
